response.job_title: IBP - S&OP | SC Business Partner | SC Excellence | Regional Supply Chain
response.summary:
I am an Industrial Engineer with experience working for multinational companies in the FMCG and pharmaceutical industries. My expertise lies in the Manufacturing & Supply Chain areas of Planning S&OP-IBP, Logistics, SC Excellence, Foreign Trade, Projects, Plants and External Manufacturing.

I have extensive experience in local and regional positions, mainly focus in supply chain management, as well as in leading cross-functional projects focused on designing and improving processes, systems and people team structures. 

I am known for my leadership, team collaboration, decision-making abilities, analytical skills, determination and entrepreneurship.
response.skills: Planificación integrada del negocio (IBP), Servicio de atención al cliente, Planificación de negocios, Obligaciones contractuales, Oos, Niveles de servicio, Gestión de pedidos, Gestión de crisis, Comunicación, supply planning, Pronóstico, Planificación de oferta y demanda, Planificación de la demanda, Objetivos de ventas, Mejora de procesos de negocio, Lanzamiento de nuevos productos, Introducción de productos, Relaciones de juntas directivas, Team Leadership, Analytical Skills

profile_positions.title: IBP - S&OP Manager & SC Business Partner | Colombia, Perú and Ecuador

profile_positions.description:
Lead the creation and consolidation of the Supply Chain Excellence area: Continuous improvement and digitalization of the procesess, strategic projects for SC, Master Data Center of Excellence, Artworks Center of Excellence, Distribution budget and KPIs.

Lead senior team: 3 managers in MX, BZ and SOCOPAC.
Create and lead Latam master data and artworks centers of excellence. (9 direct reports)
profile_positions.title: Supply Chain Excellence Lead | LATAM

profile_positions.description:
Ensure business continuity without disruption in Consumer Healthcare Business carve in for LATAM. New tools implementation: SAP HANA, CCM, EDI, WEBEDI, Kinaxis, others. Packaging Change Program planning and implementation.

Lead senior Team: 4 SC Local PMOs, 4 PCP Leaders and +50KU. Focal point with Global project and Supply Chain Team.
profile_positions.title: Supply Chain PMO | LATAM

profile_positions.description:
Active participation in the creation and implementation of governance, processes and tools for Supply Chain ExtMan COPAC, WoW with S&OP Process, CMO Management, Netdemand consolidation with batch balancing and MRP for toll APIs.

Lead MRP, Supply planning and Master Data teams.
profile_positions.title: IBP External Manufacturing Coordinator | COPAC Region

profile_positions.description:
Plant & Market Supply Chain representative: Capacity simulation and increase of headcounts in critical production lines, MPS, batchbalancing and MRP to secure business continuity with a blackout of 2 weeks. Multidiciplinary teamwork: RA, ExtMan, Foreing Trade, Plants, Controlling, Procurement, ITS, among others.

+ 0 ruptures with detailed cutover plan, stockpiling strategy and execution on time
+ develop batchbalancing tool that reduced the MPS process from 2 weeks to 10 sec with optimum batches, in consecuence -1.5MM Euros and be able to simulate several escenarios and make decisions for the project with agility and accuracy.
profile_positions.title: Plant Divestment SC PMO | COPAC Region

profile_positions.description: Inventory optimization, LSA negotiation: batch sizes, LT, frequencies, and portfolio Management.
profile_positions.title: S&OP Export Planner | COPAC Region

profile_positions.description: S&OP: Demand, DRP, MPS, MRP, capacity and Export planning.
profile_positions.title: Senior Demand Planner | Colombia

profile_positions.description: 8 manufacturing sites: MPS, MRP, capacity analysis, resource planning and production lines hour by hour.
profile_positions.title: Supply Chain Planner | Colombia

company.name: Sanofi
company.description:
We are Sanofi, an innovative global healthcare company. We chase the miracles of science to improve people’s lives. 

Our team, across some 100 countries, is dedicated to transforming the practice of medicine by working to turn the impossible into the possible. We provide potentially life-changing treatment options and life-saving vaccine protection to millions of people globally, while putting sustainability and social responsibility at the center of our ambitions.

Interactions with this account must comply with the Terms: https://bit.ly/sanofi-terms
